name: 60 Seconds To Mars (Solid Hinken)
description:
Awful Summer Jam 2019 submission.

Theme: "60 Seconds".

60 Seconds to Mars is a puzzle strategy game that lets you be Melon Usk's assistant. In not so distant future, Melon Usk's SpaceY managed to maintain solid 60-second windows between rocket launches. You, as his assistant manager have to make sure tourists reach rockets and everything is going on schedule.

How to play: Rotate tiles by clicking, Drag tiles around. Line up roads for tourists to pass through to Launch sites. Grey tiles are not movable, yet you can rotate them around.  Once tourists reach the rocket - their spawn point dissapears.

Each level has designated number of tourists to gather. Try not to run out of free space in the process.
